animal.question: I say 'meow' and love to chase string. What am I?
I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. What am I?
I quack and waddle. I love to swim in ponds. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I am a type of bird.
💦 I love to play in water.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I never forget! What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I am a very large animal.
💧 I can use my nose to spray water.

animal.question: I roar and I'm the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am a very powerful animal.

animal.question: I hop and I eat carrots. I have long ears and a fluffy tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Some people keep me as a pet.
🥕 You might see me in a garden.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 No two of my stripes are exactly the same.

animal.question: I swing from trees and love bananas. What am I?
I have a shell on my back and move very slowly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I can live for a very long time.
☀️ I like to bask in the sun.

animal.question: I am a reptile with a powerful bite. I live in rivers and swamps. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I like to eat fish and other animals.

plant.question: I have a stem and leaves, and I grow in the ground. I need water and sun to grow. What am I?
I am red and juicy, and grow on a vine. I am often used in salads. What am I?

hints.text: 🥗 I am tasty in a salad.
🍝 I am used to make a pasta sauce.

plant.question: I am tall and green, with a thick trunk and many branches. Birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍂 I can lose my leaves in the fall.

plant.question: I have petals and a stem. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 People give me as a gift.

plant.question: I am long and orange, and I grow underground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?
I have a hard shell and a white flesh inside. Monkeys love to eat me, and I grow on a very tall tree! What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys have to climb tall trees to find me.

plant.question: I am a plant that can sting you if you touch me. I have jagged leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🤕 It is best to avoid me
🌱 My leaves can be very itchy.
🌿 If you touch me you may need cream.

plant.question: I am a grass that people grow to walk on. You need to cut me so I stay short. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I am usually found in gardens.
✂️ You need a mower to maintain me.

plant.question: I am a plant with sharp needles instead of leaves. I stay green all year round. What am I?

hints.text: 🎄 I am often decorated for Christmas.
🐻 Some bears like to live near me.

plant.question: I am a plant that eats insects. I trap them with my sticky leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I grow in nutrient poor soil.
🍕 I’m named after something that can bite.
